remark.en: Required Course for Management Group of second grade of master students

goal.en: Strategy management typically is the most important course that integrates what students have learned from an MBA program. The objective of this course is to help students to have a better understanding of business strategy – what it is, how it works and what its effects are. The main purpose of business strategies is of course to help firms generate competitive advantage in the market. In this course, we will introduce most of the contemporary theories and analytical frameworks in strategy. Involved reading of the textbook and the contained cases is required. In class, the students will be called upon to explain the text and discuss the cases. Students without preparing for the class will fail the course.
goal.ch: Strategy management typically is the most important course that integrates what students have learned from an MBA program. The objective of this course is to help students to have a better understanding of business strategy – what it is, how it works and what its effects are. The main purpose of business strategies is of course to help firms generate competitive advantage in the market. In this course, we will introduce most of the contemporary theories and analytical frameworks in strategy. Involved reading of the textbook and the contained cases is required. In class, the students will be called upon to explain the text and discuss the cases. Students without preparing for the class will fail the course.

content.en:
 Instructor lecture
 Class discussion of both texts and cases (active participation is required)
 Group presentation of a case company in Taiwan to demonstrate its success or failure in strategy. The case must accompany at least a paper that provides the basis for your analysis. (Students should form six groups to present the case of your choice.)
